mapper.update: MERGE INTO image_file i USING dual ON (i.realid = #{realId}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET i.filename = #{fileName}, i.filepath = #{filePath} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (id, filename, filepath, realid) VALUES (#{id}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{realId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IMAGE_FILE (id, filename, filepath, realid) VALUES (#{id}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{realId})
